h3_title: Kang-Jin Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: Much of this fight is about patience and waiting for the right time to strike back, as you don't want to waste time swinging wildly when there's no hope of reaching the boss. Let them come to you, and look for the right moments with stationary claw swipes or tail slams to deflect with Rock Solid for a better chance to stagger them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Kang-Jin_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Kang-Jin Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Kang-Jin Loong' and the sub-subsection 'Kang-Jin Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Much of this fight is about patience and waiting for the right time to strike back, as you don't want to waste time swinging wildly when there's no hope of reaching the boss. Let them come to you, and look for the right moments with stationary claw swipes or tail slams to deflect with Rock Solid for a better chance to stagger them.
